OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.questDescriptionRul.li:
questDescription->[asker_nameFull], a seasoned [asker_royalTitleInCurrentFaction] from [asker_faction_name], just barely escaped a deadly ambush. With [asker_possessive] enemies hot on [asker_possessive] trail, [asker_pronoun] needs backup fast. Protect [asker_objective] at [map_definite] until reinforcements arrive, and [asker_pronoun] promises a cut of [royalFavorReward] [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel].
The group of [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] is composed of:
[raid/raidPawnKinds]

[asker_nameDef] is too busy dodging bullets to give more details.

questDescription->[asker_nameFull], one of the slickest [asker_royalTitleInCurrentFaction] in [asker_faction_name], barely slipped away from an ambush gone wrong. Now, [asker_possessive] enemies are closing in fast, and [asker_pronoun] needs help staying alive until backup comes. Meet [asker_nameDef] at [map_definite], keep [asker_pronoun] safe, and you'll be rewarded with [royalFavorReward] [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel].
The group of [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] is composed of:
[raid/raidPawnKinds]

[asker_nameDef] is too shaken up to give more details.

questDescription->[asker_nameFull], a key figure in [asker_faction_name], walked into a trap. With [asker_possessive] guards dead and [asker_pronoun] on the run, there’s little time to lose. [asker_pronoun] needs backup at [map_definite] to fend off the enemies until the heat dies down. [asker_pronoun] promises [royalFavorReward] [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] in exchange.
The group of [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] is composed of:
[raid/raidPawnKinds]

[asker_nameDef] is too frantic to explain more.

LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.ShuttleD: The shuttle has arrived to collect [asker_nameDef].
LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.askerDes: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has died. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.askerSur: Unauthorized, violating surgery has been performed on {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect. Because of this violation, [asker_pronoun] will now attempt to leave. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.askerXen: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has had {SUBJECT_possessive} xenogerm forcibly absorbed. Because of this violation, {SUBJECT_pronoun} will now attempt to leave. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.askerArr: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to host, has been arrested. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.askerLef: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has left the designated settlement. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.askerRan: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has run wild. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.OE_Quest_HuntedAgent.root.nodes.pickupSh: The shuttle sent to collect [asker_nameDef] has been destroyed. [asker_pronoun] will now leave on foot. [failLetterEndingCommon]
The shuttle sent to collect [asker_nameDef] has departed without [asker_objective]. [asker_pronoun] will now leave on foot. [failLetterEndingCommon]
